Embedded_text:
TD Ameritrade backed exchange gets approval to settle futures in bitcoin, joining Bakkt and LedgerX.

Unlike other exchanges, actual bitcoin is paid out, not the fiat equivalent of bitcoin.

This means better price discovery and liquidity for bitcoin.

Huge news for the market.
